name: Flopping Fish Cat Toy
description:
Self Moving
The FIRST Flopping Fish Cat Toy that moves on its own!

Battery Powered
Easy USB     recharging - NO more wasting batteries!

Refillable Catnip Pouch
Cat safe velcro pocket is easy to refill over and over again!

Looks Exactly like a Fish!
The resemblance will surprise you!

XL SIZE!
Length: 30cm.

SOFT & CUDDLY!
Made of Plush and Cotton.

FOUR VARIANTS AVAILABLE!

Gerald, Ronald, Bill & George Floppy Fish Cat Toys

This Floppy Fish Cat Toy will keep your kitty entertained for hours with its wagging and dancing moves.

Easy USB rechargeable and motion activated so cats can make it start flipping on its own. After moving for a while the Flopping Fish Cat Toy stops to save battery life when cats stop playing with it so you don't need to worry about turning it off. Refillable catnip pouch pocket and 4 variants available. Don't miss out! Spoil your kitty with our Flippity Floppity Fish!

Refillable catnip pouch pocket.

4 variants available. 25% Off and Free Shiping today.

Special offer: BUY 2 FISHIES AND GET 25% OFF the second unit!

1 X Flopping Fish Cat Toy = $24.99 

2 X Flopping Fish Cat Toy = $43.7 (SAVE $6.25)

3 X Flopping Fish Cat Toy = $59.99 (SAVE $15)

name: Banana Cat Bed
description: Your cat will, literally, go BANANAS over this bed. It's the perfect bed for YOUR KITTY! It will be its own soft, cozy & comfy spot.

The Banana Cat Bed features a peelable banana peel that allows your cat to sneak in and out while still having the privacy they require. Just peel open the top layer of the peel to sneak a peek at your kitty snoozing inside.

Tons of fun, guaranteed!

Kittenfy's Banana Cat Bed is available in 3 different colors and 3 different sizes for you to choose the perfect fit.

Our Costumers say...

Treat your loved one with this luxurious, soft & comfy fake fur bed. Our Marshmallow Bed is designed to provide your Kitty with the most recomforting sleep. This fluffy as a marshmallow cat bed will provide a stress free, relaxing zone for your loved one.

Cat approved! The comforting donut shape makes cats feel warm and safe.

Available in 5 sizes and 9 colors, choose the perfect one for your Kitty!

Very easy to wash and dry!

name: Double Cat Shelf
description:
Our Wood & Canvas Cat Double Shelf is the best way to fulfill your kitty’s climbing needs within the safety of your home. Designed for jumping, sleeping and playing, it’s everything your cat could wish for.

Customizable: create your own cat wall design by combining it with our cat bridge, escalator and shelf.

Wall-mounted: free up your floor space and provide your kitty some extra room for leisure time.

Private Space: It allows cats to have a space of their own, high enough for them to feel safe from any perceived danger.
Behavior Solution: It can help solve behavior and territory issues in homes with multiple cats by giving them vertical space.
Designed with care: Every variable was taken into consideration while creating our Wood & Canvas Cat Shelf.

Simple and sturdy design blends in any home décor
    Hidden brackets give shelves a floating look
    Design to mount into studs spaced 16” apart

Easy to navigate mounting instructions
    Total Width: 35in / 89cm
    Height: 15in / 38cm
    Depth: 11in / 28cm
    Available in 3 different wood finishes: Unfinished, English Chestnut & Onyx
